title: Bedrock in a NodeJS Lambda
description: Create a Step Functions workflow to query Amazon Athena.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern shows how to make use of Bedrock within a Lambda function on NodeJS runtime.
The business logic is in ./src/index.js. You can use sample payloads stored in ./events to test the function.

authors.name: Giuseppe Battista
authors.bio: Giuseppe Battista is a Senior Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services. He leads soultions architecture for Early Stage Startups in UK and Ireland. He hosts the Twitch Show "Let's Build a Startup" on twitch.tv/aws and he's head of Unicorn's Den accelerator.
